short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays an animation of a bear in front of the YouTube player.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bear Youtube Moderator

🐻 Transform Your YouTube Experience! 🐻

Introducing the Bear Youtube Moderator, an extension that adds a whimsical touch to your YouTube browsing. Every time you play a video or hover over a thumbnail, a delightful bear animation appears, reminding you to take a moment, smile, and enjoy the lighter side of the internet.

Features:

🎥 Video Player Animation: As soon as you hit play, our friendly bear greets you right in front of the video player.
🖼️ Thumbnail Surprise: Hover over video thumbnails and discover the bear animation making every scroll a fun experience.
🎨 Seamless Integration: Designed to blend smoothly with the YouTube interface without disrupting your browsing.
Perfect for those who love a touch of joy in their daily routine, or simply want to make their YouTube experience a tad bear-able! Install now and let the bear bring a smile to your face.
